name: TE Academy Education
description:
Rooted in the Optimism Ecosystem, Token Engineering Academy (TE Academy) provides applied research and education to ‚àº5K professionals and students covering mechanism design, token-based governance, tokenomics, and more. TE Academy‚Äôs mission is to establish rigorous design, verification, and optimization of token-based systems. We call this token engineering, a new crypto-native engineering field.

Our educational activities include online courses like Token Engineering Fundamentals, cohort-based programs like the 2024 Study Season Program, and workshops and programs at conferences such as EthCC and Devconnect Istanbul. All of our educational programs are provided as public goods, with no fees for students. 
TE Fundamentals: https://tokenengineering.net/
2024 Study Season Program: https://te-academy.notion.site/Welcome-to-TE-Academy-s-Study-Season-Information-Hub-dde8cebd28344071acffa4cf3d195c01

TE Academy‚Äôs services include mechanism design and incentive strategies for crypto protocols and Dapps. We draw from scientific fields such as game theory, systems engineering, and social choice theory. We apply theoretical analysis, modeling, and simulations, as well as machine learning and AI.

Our global network includes top cryptoeconomics researchers (e.g., GovXS, BlockScience, Gauntlet, Ethereum Foundation, Metagov) and tokenomics practitioners (e.g., 1kx, Messari, Tokenomia.pro, etc.) 
Our partners include Optimism, Gnosis, Carbon DeFi, Ocean Protocol, Consensys, Balancer, ENS DAO, 1kx, Outlier Ventures, and more.

We invest in finding and supporting young talents via our online educational program with students enrolled from all over the world, in addition to our Fellowship Prize that awards the most relevant work in our field with visibility and a cash prize.
Fellowship Program: https://te-academy.notion.site/Vote-Now-to-Decide-TE-Academy-s-2024-Fellowship-Winner-efe7fdd5d02d48498e00c37066a23550?pvs=4

Token Engineering Academy is a proud recipient of  Retro Funding in round 2 and round 3, and we remain proud to re-invest these funds to equip the Optimism community with the education and expertise needed to drive the long-term success of the Superchain.

name: Tea-Fi
description:
Build on KATANA (POL & GSR De-fi chain)

Founded in October 2023, Tea-Fi was built with a clear mission: to simplify and open up decentralized finance through an accessible, opportunity-driven ecosystem. Positioned at the intersection of usability and real-world utility, Tea-Fi enables users to participate in DeFi across networks, strategies, and risk levels‚Äîall through a unified, efficient platform. It‚Äôs not just about connecting wallets to protocols; it‚Äôs about creating a structured environment where value, control, and growth are accessible to users at every level.
Rather than building isolated products, Tea-Fi was architected as a multi-layered system:
A modular vault infrastructure, enabling exposure to curated real yield opportunities
Seamless cross-chain interaction and asset movement
On- and off-ramp integration for frictionless entry and exit
A native token economy that ties protocol success to user alignment
This architecture is supported by active protocol development, a growing network of strategic partnerships, and a long-term roadmap that includes lending markets, restaking mechanisms, index-based yield products, and more.
At the foundation of Tea-Fi‚Äôs design are three core values that guide both product development and ecosystem direction:
Opportunities
 Tea-Fi is committed to delivering authentic, sustainable financial opportunities that reflect real market activity. Strategies are designed to accommodate a variety of user profiles‚Äîacross chains, risk appetites, and time horizons‚Äîwhile maximizing efficiency and minimizing friction.
Simplicity
 In a sector known for complexity, Tea-Fi removes barriers. From intuitive UI/UX to features like Easy-Gas and unified transaction flows, the platform is structured to support seamless user journeys‚Äîfrom first deposit to advanced strategy participation.
Ecosystem Collaboration
 Tea-Fi believes in building with the ecosystem, not outside it. Whether through deployment of Tea-Fi modules on third-party platforms, aggregation of external DeFi products, or infrastructure-based collaborations, Tea-Fi is positioned as a hub‚Äînot a silo‚Äîwithin the decentralized economy.
Together, these pillars support a clear vision: to grow responsibly, integrate meaningfully, and deliver long-term value for users, partners, and the broader DeFi landscape.

in addition - Tea-Fi offers high APY managed Yeild Vaults (for further explanation - https://docs.google.com/document/d/1kHJ0HTVVUDzFqrqLdJDs6dQGTbQHe3kIVd2QrFNah3s/edit?tab=t.0 )

At the heart of Tea-Fi‚Äôs economic architecture lies the TeaPot Vault‚ÄîTea-Fi‚Äôs protocol-owned liquidity layer, and a direct reflection of the protocol‚Äôs long-term alignment with its users. This vault is identical in structure and operating principles to the same vaults offered to users on the platform. Rather than simply promoting yield strategies externally, Tea-Fi commits its own capital under the exact same conditions‚Äîdemonstrating full confidence in the system it has built.
Performance fees, swap revenues, and future service-based earnings are directed into the TeaPot Vault. These funds are never withdrawn. Instead, only the yield generated from these assets is utilized‚Äîprimarily for TEA token buybacks and strategic ecosystem incentives. This structure creates a self-reinforcing flywheel: capital enters once, and its yield continues to deliver value to the protocol and its users over time.
By locking protocol revenue into its own vault, Tea-Fi transforms earnings into productive, yield-bearing capital, reinforcing both the protocol‚Äôs credibility and the durability of its economic model. This design is not just symbolic‚Äîit‚Äôs structural: revenues aren‚Äôt extracted or cycled back through short-term incentives, but are retained within the protocol, where they continue generating sustainable returns.
This approach protects long-term Total Value Locked (TVL) by anchoring a base layer of capital within the system itself. It also enables Tea-Fi to offer high APYs without relying on inflationary token emissions, since rewards are powered by real yield from deployed assets‚Äînot synthetic incentives. Over time, the TeaPot Vault becomes a growing source of long-term liquidity, tied directly to the protocol‚Äôs overall economic success

name: Terrene Hiraeth
description:
Pob Studio, an independent NFT studio established in 2020 and the creators of novel NFT experiences that celebrate blockchain history. Our work highlights our rich crypto culture and heritage, telling stories often lost in blockchain records. Our pride is bringing communities together over our shared history and as stewards of crypto heritage, we aim to see our stories forever preserved.‚Ä®

We stand with conviction that exceptional NFT production demands smart contract designs which put collectors first, and all our latest projects feature our fully on-chain NFT design called The Collector Std. The Collector Std. was first deployed on Base in August 2023 and is the bedrock of our projects today. This guarantees our collectors increased transparency, decentralization, and fully on-chain NFT metadata.

Today each blockchain contains its own history, culture, and records that allude to the happenings of our industry. Terrene Hiraeth was created so we can all take part in telling our stories and share in the joy of preserving our heritage and history.

Terrene Hiraeth is a multichain storytelling experience that transforms blockchain history into art. Hiraeth is simple: onchain art is generated from transaction hash records, capturing the txn details in the features of the artwork. Tokenize relics of blockchain history.

Try it: pob.studio/hiraeth

Hiraeth is live now on Base and Ethereum in Alpha. We've got some incredible features planned that we'll be releasing throughout onchain summer.

Our target audience is collectors of NFTs that value onchain art, history, and generative art with highly interactive and dynamic features.

Mint begins on Base, then Ethereum and we've got plans to deploy on Optimism, Arbitrum, and Polygon, later in the year, expanding to wherever history happens.‚Ä®

name: Terrene Hiraeth by Pob Studio
description:
Terrene Hiraeth is an NFT collection where each piece represents a moment in blockchain history. Every NFT is a one-of-a-kind artwork, capturing the essence of a unique blockchain transaction and reflecting humanity's onchain interactions.

A multichain experience, Terrene Hiraeth is actively minting on Base and Ethereum. It is also live on Optimism, with minting coming soon‚Äîdeployed just in time for the Sunny‚Äôs, celebrating creators and projects on Optimism.

This summer, Terrene Hiraeth won the Onchain Summer Buildathon and was awarded by Base for successfully integrating the Coinbase Smart Wallet feature.

Discover the next generation of NFT storytelling‚Äîmint NFTs from transaction records and tokenize relics of blockchain history.

The Book of Optimism Fault Proof

The Book of Optimism Fault Proof repository is a resource aimed at demystifying the fault proof system for newcomers and seasoned developers alike. Centered around the transformative concept of a fault proof system, this project shifts away from centralized proposers to a mechanism grounded in game theory. The purpose of this document is to offer a multifaceted explanation of the fault proof system, providing newcomers with a rapid understanding of its mechanics and the specific details of its code.

1. Starting with the Basics

The journey into understanding fault proof begins with the simplest design of such a system. This approach breaks down the complexity of fault proof into manageable parts, making it easier for newcomers to grasp the fundamental concepts and how they interconnect within the broader system architecture.

2. Key Components Explained

Fault Proof: At its core, the fault proof mechanism replaces centralized proposer systems, which are susceptible to biases and inefficiencies, with a decentralized, game-theory-based approach.
Fault Proof Game: This component employs a binary search technique to pinpoint and verify discrepancies between parties on the blockchain, ensuring transparency and fairness in dispute resolution.
Cannon: An off-chain program, Cannon is pivotal in generating verifiable data needed for on-chain interactions, bridging the gap between theoretical fault proof and practical implementation.
op-program: This tool provides the necessary prototype files for Cannon, facilitating services for pre-image data crucial for the system‚Äôs operations.
op-challenger: Automating the gameplay elements of the fault proof system, op-challenger utilizes both Cannon and op-program to streamline processes and enhance system integrity.

3. Architecture Mechanics

Understanding the architecture of the fault proof system involves exploring how these components work together to form a robust mechanism. From the deployment of smart contracts and proxies on the Ethereum blockchain, identified by specific addresses such as MIPS and DisputeGameFactoryProxy, to the integration of off-chain computations with on-chain verifications, the architecture is designed for scalability and security.

4. Comprehensive Resources

Further enriching this document, an extensive collection of articles and videos is summarized, providing deep dives into each component and the fault proof mechanism as a whole. These resources are meticulously curated to extend learning beyond the initial explanations, offering insights into potential applications and optimizations of the fault proof system.

5. For Newcomers and Experts

Whether you are a new entrant eager to understand the basics or an expert looking to refine your knowledge of decentralized systems, the repository offers a wealth of information designed to bring all readers up to speed on the innovative fault proof system.

name: The Ethernaut
description:
The Ethernaut is a community-driven capture-the-flag wargame that challenges developers of all levels to break smart contracts while learning common Solidity vulnerabilities. Maintained by OpenZeppelin, each level provides a gamified experience where a smart contract must be ‚Äòhacked‚Äô to progress. It is 100% open-source, with all levels contributed by players.

In 2024, we have continued expanding the game, adding four new advanced levels‚ÄîHigherOrder, Stake, Impersonator, and Magic Animal Carousel‚Äîwhich explore current vulnerabilities in smart contract development. These levels introduce challenges related to low-level EVM programming, staking vulnerabilities, signature verification exploits, and bitwise manipulation attacks, pushing players to deepen their understanding of Ethereum security.

Beyond new levels, we have also redesigned the UI, added support for multiple networks, and expanded language translations to make the game more accessible to a global audience.

We believe that The Ethernaut is an essential training tool for developers across the Ethereum ecosystem, including those building on the Optimism network. By continually evolving the game with new challenges and features, we strive to make smart contract security education engaging, practical, and accessible to everyone.

name: The Grand Timeline
description:
The Grand Timeline is a historical research project and a massive data visualization covering the entire history of Crypto and Web3. It‚Äôs like writing a book but as a designer. I've been working on this as a side project for 3 years, off and on. This is solo project, there‚Äôs no team, company, or sponsor behind it. A lot has already been done, but it's still a rough draft / alpha / work in progress stage. Now, I want to show the community my current progress, ask for feedback, and find support and sponsors. The project lives in Figma where I work on it publicly. The minimum plan is to finish a static digital poster + a physical "small" poster, and a full-size 8m / 320-inch wide canvas for readability of all the tiny text. But the goal is to find funding to make an interactive web version with UI. 

This project tells about Crypto and Web3 in a completely different format and attracts new people to crypto. People become curious and they learn more, it works better than books which people often don't have time for.

name: The Magic Machine
description:
Based on the Tezos Art Vending Machine Project "The Magic Machine" aims to solve some of the most important problems in the current onchain art scene. Helping artists and users in the same time. With the focus on discovering, curation and distribution, the Magic Machine provides artists with a way to distribute their artworks to a selected audience and collectors with new high quality artworks in a couple of clicks.

Creators flow
¬∑ Create.
¬∑ Send artwork to the machine.
¬∑ Enjoy.

Collectors flow
¬∑ Click the "Find Art" button in the machine frame.
¬∑ Choose a chain and a payment method. Confirm.
¬∑ Get random high quality artworks in their wallets.

what does mean for creators and collectors?
We provide artists a new way to increase their exposure with no effort through our innovative system of distribution and we also are in charge of curating the artworks providing our users only high quality artworks saving tons of gold (time) for all of them.

For creators this means that they can focus on creating high quality art while the Magic Machine is in charge of randomly distributing it to a selected audience in the Farcaster network. Freeing them of the struggle to fight againts others artists for a bit of attention. With the Magic Machine, the attention of collectors is fairly distributed between all the artists and artworks contributing to the protocol ensuring that all of them remains visible to collectors.

Currently collectors have to spend their attention, time and effort, scrolling through tons of low effort art. With the Magic Machine, collectors only need about 1 minute to discover and collect 3 new high quality artworks. Giving them the rest of the day, about 86340 seconds, to do whatever they want to do.

In the future, a reward mechanism based on points could also help with engagement, offering loyal users and artists a way to extract the maximum value for their contributions.

name: The nice club
description:
understanding blockchain technology is essential for navigating the future of finance and transactions. This proposal outlines an initiative aimed at educating people and young adults about blockchain, providing them with the tools to engage confidently in the digital economy.

Objectives:

1. Educate Participants: Introduce the fundamentals of blockchain technology.


2. Practical Experience: Offer hands-on workshops to practice blockchain transactions.


3. Financial Support: Provide subsidies for educational materials and tools.



Target Audience: adult and young adults, particularly those who may not have access to resources to learn about new technologies.

Program Outline:

1. Workshops: Interactive sessions covering:

Basics of blockchain technology

How transactions work on a blockchain

Real-world applications and benefits of blockchain



2. Resources: Access to educational materials,
3. Subsidies: Financial assistance for participants to cover costs related to learning tools and resources.
Implementation Timeline:

Phase 1 (Month 1-2): Outreach and registration
Phase 2 (Months 2-3): Conduct workshops and distribute resources
Phase 3 (Month 4-6): Evaluate program effectiveness and gather feedback
Budget Overview:
Workshop materials
Subsidies for participants
Marketing and outreach



Conclusion: By supporting this initiative, we can empower the next generation to harness the potential of blockchain technology. Together, we can build a foundation for financial literacy and innovation

name: The Open X Project
description:
Our project operates the most used veNFT Market in crypto, responsible for more veNFT trading volume than all other NFT Markets combined. It has saved users >355k USD in fees (compared to OpenSea, the second most used Marketplace for veNFTs). Its UI introduced tools for tracking locked amounts, unlock dates, etc. -- without which most users would be unable to safely trade these positions. It is the only any-erc20-for-any-erc721 contract that exists. We've seen >17.5M USD in volume across Superchain deployments. On Optimism, these contracts have facilitated more volume than all other NFT Market contracts combined since their release; they've accounted for > 4% of all NFT volume on Base. 

We developed the only (non-deprecated) liquid staking project for veVELO. Its vote-matching program is the only such program of its kind that exists. This program allows projects and users alike to receive votes by pairing a token with opxVELO. Each week, a snapshot captures the amount of opxVELO in each pool, and the pool receives one vote for each opxVELO pooled. It has achieved its success without subsidy, grants, or outside funding. Its historical performance matches or bests the majority of all liquid staking projects for vote-escrow positions. 

Our tokens serve a function within our projects. They have been responsible for hundreds of thousands of transfers on Optimism. We originally deployed the Open X Project on Optimism in September of 2022.

name: The Sound Ecosystem By Malik Naim
description:
What is Sound Ecos?

My name is Malik Naim, I am a creative who's most passionate mediums are sound and pen. When I began exploring blockchain technology for my art, my goal was to create a more immersive experience for my fans. I wanted to forge a deeper connection with my audience beyond traditional means, leading to the creation of the Soundverse. This journey began in 2021 with Rap Pack NFTs, where I offered streaming royalties in exchange for holding my music NFTs. While this was a fruitful start, I aimed to dive deeper than merely sharing streaming royalties.

I envisioned a storybook world governed entirely by sound, which led to the development of multiple Music NFT PFP collectibles. These offered rewards such as custom songs, chapter features within the Soundverse story, and various interactive opportunities. As I expanded this world, I focused on building the lore around my original holders and engaged new fans.

I released singles as open editions on Ethereum and Polygon. Discovering Sound XYZ allowed me to launch songs on the Optimism (OP) chain. Throughout 2022, I distributed NFTs through email signups and other messaging methods, onboarding new and existing investors to OP. Influencers from East Asia supported my releases due to the low entry price, ensuring that anyone, regardless of their financial situation, could hold my music. This inclusive approach was well-received by my community.

Working with P00ls, I developed Sound Coin, which now has 13,000 holders across various L2 chains. My broader vision involves transitioning these Polygon holders to the OP chain with Sound Gold ($SGLD), the main currency for exclusive and immersive experiences. Both tokens offer redeemable content and services, with significant potential for interactivity.

On the BASE network, I released Based Sound ($BSOUND), an active liquidity and educational token. Buying $BSOUND grants a music meme NFT on BASE, with staking options to earn music NFTs from my Based Music collection. The goal is to create a user-friendly interface that connects me with my fans in an intimate way.

Additionally, I am developing a simple game initially available to beta testers (my top holders) before a wider release on web2 and web3. The game, featuring crypto, music, and popular trends, will integrate blockchain technology, allowing players to earn Sound Coin and Sound Gold based on their performance. This game will strengthen my ecosystem and benefit the blockchain as a whole.

Benefits of the Soundverse Ecosystem:

	1.	Sound Gold:
	‚Ä¢	Attracts my existing community and new users interested in music-related utility products on the OP chain.
	‚Ä¢	Fosters consistent interactions and utility through my frequent music and content releases.
	‚Ä¢	Attracts high-level investors to the OP chain once the proof of concept is established.
	2.	Web3 Integrated Game:
	‚Ä¢	Appeals to music fans, gamers, and P2E crypto users, exposing more ETH-based users to the OP chain.
	‚Ä¢	Generates cash flow through in-game ads, with a portion used to add liquidity to Sound Gold and Sound Coin.
	‚Ä¢	Features my music catalog during gameplay, enhancing my brand.
	‚Ä¢	Releases a Music NFT PFP collection on OP, with traits that provide gameplay rewards.
	3.	Sound Coin (Polygon):
	‚Ä¢	Facilitates the onboarding of Polygon holders to OP, leveraging over 300,000 interactions and weekly earnings.

The Sound Ecos is continuously evolving. I am proud of the progress and believe the Soundverse Ecosystem can serve as a blueprint for other artists seeking to build their identity and foster greater interactions. If awarded a grant, I would use the funds for further development, initial liquidity for Sound Gold, and additional marketing, promotion, and mint rewards.

I aim to keep the game and coin integration simple, providing a low-risk environment for users to enjoy the blockchain while engaging with my music. Consistent releases on OP/BASE/ZORA and other L2s will remain a cornerstone of my growing ecosystem.

name: Ticking Optimism
description:
Ticking Optimism is a fork of op-node that adds an additional system transaction to every block. This transaction can be configured to call a specific address with an arbitrary amount of gas.

By using ticking-optimism, developers can deploy an OP Stack rollup with a protocol-level guarantee that a specific smart contract method will be called at the begining of every block (after the L1 attributes transaction) without having to rely on a keeper.

I started working on it at the end of 2022 in order to put Conway's Game of Life onchain and have kept it updated to a recent version of the OP Stack since.

Notably, ticking-optimism was one of the first op-node forks that took advantage of the modularity of the OP Stack to add new functionality to a rollup.

name: Timelock
description:
Timelock ‚Äì Blockchain Time-Delay Security Solution
Timelock is the next-generation decentralized execution safeguard layer, establishing amandatory review bufferfor every critical on-chain operation. It empowers DeFi protocols, DAOs, cross-chain bridges, and multi-sig wallets to prevent instant-execution attacks and elevate the overall Web3 security standard.

üí∞For Fund Security
Want to safeguard treasuries, cross-chain transfers, and large-scale operations?
1.Smart Protection: Adds security buffers for fund transfers, treasury operations, and contract upgrades.
2.Mandatory Delay: Enforces waiting periods and multi-step confirmations for large fund movements.
3.Risk Detection: AI-powered monitoring to identify potential theft and abnormal activities.
4.Emergency Reversal: One-click cancellation of high-risk pending transactions.

Looking for more reliable contract parameter updates, governance changes, and member role modifications?

3.Auditable: Every action is recorded on-chain, with real-time monitoring and alerts.

4.Parameter Parsing: Converts complex technical parameters into readable format
Risk Assessment: Multi-dimensional risk assessment and anomaly detection
Emergency Revocation: One-click cancellation for queued transactions

name: tip.md
description:
tip.md is a user-friendly platform enabling developers to receive cryptocurrency tips directly to their wallets through a simple embeddable button. Our solution works across multiple blockchains (Ethereum, Solana, Bitcoin Lightning) and can be added to GitHub READMEs, websites, or any markdown content with just a single line of code.

We've designed tip.md to solve the funding challenges faced by open-source developers by providing a frictionless way for users to show appreciation through crypto tips. The platform features direct-to-wallet payments with no intermediaries holding funds, automated fee distribution via Splits.org, and a clean dashboard for tracking donation history.

With our 4% platform fee model, we only earn when creators do. Our integration with MCP (Model Context Protocol) also allows AI assistants like Claude and Cursor to help users tip creators in cryptocurrency without leaving their chat interface.

tip.md aims to create sustainable funding streams for developers while making cryptocurrency tipping accessible to everyone who wants to support the projects they love.

name: Titan Layer
description:
Introduction-

The exponential growth of blockchain networks has led to a fragmented ecosystem, with limited interoperability between chains. Users and developers face significant challenges when transferring assets or deploying contracts across multiple chains. Titan Layer addresses these issues by offering an easy-to-use, secure, and scalable platform that fosters cross-chain connectivity. With a focus on user experience and interoperability, Titan Layer aims to drive blockchain adoption and foster activity across networks.

Challenges in Cross-Chain Interoperability

Fragmented Ecosystem: Users must navigate multiple wallets and bridges, leading to complexity and errors.

Security Risks: Many existing bridges are vulnerable to hacks and exploits.

Scalability Issues: High gas fees and slow transaction times hinder seamless cross-chain transactions.

Limited User Experience: Current solutions are often technical and unfriendly to non-technical users.


Titan Layer's Solution-

Titan Layer solves these challenges by:

Simplified Bridging: A one-stop solution for transferring assets across chains with minimal steps.

Contract Deployer: An intuitive tool that allows users to easily deploy and interact with contracts across multiple chains.

Hyperlane Integration: We leverage Hyperlane for secure, decentralized ERC20 token bridging.

User-Centric Design: A streamlined user interface designed to cater to both beginners and advanced users.


Key Features-

Multi-Chain Support: Titan Layer supports major networks such as Arbitrum, Optimism, Polygon, Base, BSC, and Mantle.

Customizable Connectivity: Users can choose which chains to connect for a tailored experience.

Security First: Robust security measures, including audits and encryption, to protect users' assets.

Easy Deployment: One-click smart contract deployment across multiple chains, reducing technical barriers.

Real-Time Monitoring: Dashboard for tracking transactions, bridging status, and contract interactions.


Use Cases-

Developers: Effortlessly deploy and interact with contracts across multiple chains.

Traders: Seamlessly transfer assets across chains to capitalize on arbitrage or market opportunities.

Projects: Launch multi-chain dApps with ease, expanding their reach and user base.

name: Titanoboa

It enables developers to test and debug Vyper contracts directly within Python, offering features like pretty tracebacks, forking, debugging capabilities, pytest integration and out-of-the box fuzzing. Beyond its standalone capabilities, Titanoboa serves as the foundation for other popular testing frameworks like Ape and Moccasin, and is a core piece of infrastructure for the Vyper ecosystem.

TokenFactory is an all-in-one DeFi platform that simplifies Web3 token and NFT creation and management. The platform features a complete token creation suite, NFT launchpad, A bridge, Swap, and my newly added  product - the Meme Factory.
The Meme Factory revolutionizes meme token launches by providing one-click deployment with instant QuickSwap liquidity pool creation. It includes essential features like auto-liquidity generation, anti-bot protection, and whale limits, all accessible through an intuitive interface. By automating complex smart contract interactions and providing built-in security features, we're making token creation accessible while maintaining high security standards.
The platform solves the critical problem of technical barriers in token creation, helping creators focus on building their communities rather than wrestling with smart contract complexities.

name: Token Historical Balance
description:
The OP Token Historical Balance is a critical tool developed by WakeUp Labs that improves the usability and functionality of the Optimism blockchain. This service empowers developers, analysts, and users by enabling them to query historical blockchain data at any specific moment in time. It supports queries for any public view function of smart contracts deployed on Optimism, from the very first block to the present. By providing access to historical state data, this project directly supports transparency, research, and analytics, which are crucial for the evolution and understanding of the Optimism ecosystem.

Our project contributes to the OP Stack Tooling category by providing a fundamental utility that facilitates better decision-making, auditing, and research within the Optimism network. This tool is vital for developers who require accurate historical data to test, validate, and optimize their applications. Additionally, it promotes the growth of the Optimism ecosystem by reducing barriers to entry and fostering a more robust environment for innovation.

WakeUp Labs is dedicated to advancing the capabilities of Ethereum's Layer 2 solutions, and we believe that tools like the OP Token Historical Balance are essential for driving adoption and enhancing the overall developer experience. By making Optimism's blockchain data more accessible and usable, we aim to empower the community and fuel the next wave of development on the OP Stack.

name: Trash NFTs
description:
Trash NFTs is a project built on Base that leverages the unique properties of the ERC404 token standard. We had the idea for Trash NFTs as a way to combine artichokelord‚Äôs incredible artwork with novel tech to create something fun that pushed the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible for a memecoin. We chose to build Trash NFTs on Base because we believe in the future of the Superchain and the supportive community of builders it fosters.

Between the two contracts associated with Trash NFTs, the project has generated over 1300 onchain transactions.

Demo video: https://youtu.be/KORe_xnJx1w?si=6V52TlkOfLz3hySz
Video of artichokelord drawing the art: https://warpcast.com/trashnfts/0xc65d2a4e

ERC404 is an experimental token standard pioneered by Pandora on February 2, 2024. ERC404 tokens embrace characteristics of both ERC20 and ERC721 tokens: They are ‚Äúsemi-fungible,‚Äù enabling both highly liquid markets and uniqueness within a single asset. This allows collectors to sell their tokens when they want and in pieces, if they‚Äôd like, as well as introduces the ability to reroll your NFT traits by making more transactions. ERC404s are inherently fractionalized and designed to work natively with existing DeFi protocols. While innovative, it‚Äôs important to note that ERC404 is also experimental.

When we first launched $TRASH, we forked Pandora‚Äôs contract and raced to be one of the first, if not the first project to deploy an ERC404 on Base. Pandora‚Äôs contract was limited to 5 variations of artwork, images that implied a reveal down the line, so we followed suit with 5 closed-lid NFTs of different rarities. Our next goal was to have a PFP collection with the lids removed, so we came up with the idea to create a new contract where you could stash your $TRASH and mint a Dumpster Diver. This contract is named The Dumpster. It is open source and available to any other ERC404 token that wishes to fork it to enable their holders to redeem their ERC404 token for an ERC721.

In addition to the ability to mint an ERC721 by depositing an ERC404, the Dumpster contract enables holders of Dumpster Divers PFP tokens to burn their ERC721 to redeem the original ERC404 that the ERC721 was minted with (retaining the rarity and token ID). A small cleaning fee (0.00042069 ETH, updatable by governance) is charged, and this mechanism can also be used for regenerating/rerolling or ‚Äòrecycling‚Äô, Dumpster Diver PFPs to get the desired traits.

We have grown to 185 holders and have generated $44k from trade fees (50% of which is $TRASH and 100% of which is reinvested in providing liquidity for our pools), and 1,654,148 DEGEN (~$40k) from liquidity mining rewards. We were also a finalist in the Backdrop Build V3 Accelerator Program (top 5% of applicants). 

Trash NFTs have built an effective machine: by owning the LPs that facilitate the swaps into $TRASH we capture 1% of the volume and store that in our treasury. We have two liquidity pools: 1) TRASH/ETH and 2) TRASH/ DEGEN, the rapidly growing meme token with utility in the Farcaster network and beyond. This exposes Trash NFTs to volatility, which generates more revenue because arbitrage bots stabilize the price across pools. 

Trash NFTs is also governed by a DAO called Waste Management that was initially allocated 20% of all $TRASH tokens. This DAO collects the cleaning fees associated with trait rerolls as well as the transaction fees and LP rewards from its DeFi activities. Finally, Trash NFTs has entered the meatspace by hosting a trash pickup event during Farcon 2024 with /humankind. 

We are proud of Trash NFTs, as it has maintained and proven to be a sound investment for its holder base while operating successfully. There are definite improvements we continue working toward: 1) expanding growth efforts to the broader 404 ecosystem with partnerships (such as Scattering.io with which we have built a relationship) and promotion, 2) revamping The Dumpster website for a more seamless experience and 3) engaging the community to take leadership in expanding the DAO.

name: Trash NFTs
description:
Trash NFTs is a project built on Base that leverages the unique properties of the ERC404 token standard. We had the idea for Trash NFTs as a way to combine artichokelord‚Äôs incredible artwork with novel tech to create something fun that pushed the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible for a memecoin. We chose to build Trash NFTs on Base because we believe in the future of the Superchain and the supportive community of builders it fosters.

Between the two contracts associated with Trash NFTs, the project has generated over 1300 onchain transactions.

Demo video: https://youtu.be/KORe_xnJx1w?si=6V52TlkOfLz3hySz
Video of artichokelord drawing the art: https://warpcast.com/trashnfts/0xc65d2a4e

ERC404 is an experimental token standard pioneered by Pandora on February 2, 2024. ERC404 tokens embrace characteristics of both ERC20 and ERC721 tokens: They are ‚Äúsemi-fungible,‚Äù enabling both highly liquid markets and uniqueness within a single asset. This allows collectors to sell their tokens when they want and in pieces, if they‚Äôd like, as well as introduces the ability to reroll your NFT traits by making more transactions. ERC404s are inherently fractionalized and designed to work natively with existing DeFi protocols. While innovative, it‚Äôs important to note that ERC404 is also experimental.

When we first launched $TRASH, we forked Pandora‚Äôs contract and raced to be one of the first, if not the first project to deploy an ERC404 on Base. Pandora‚Äôs contract was limited to 5 variations of artwork, images that implied a reveal down the line, so we followed suit with 5 closed-lid NFTs of different rarities. Our next goal was to have a PFP collection with the lids removed, so we came up with the idea to create a new contract where you could stash your $TRASH and mint a Dumpster Diver. This contract is named The Dumpster. It is open source and available to any other ERC404 token that wishes to fork it to enable their holders to redeem their ERC404 token for an ERC721.

In addition to the ability to mint an ERC721 by depositing an ERC404, the Dumpster contract enables holders of Dumpster Divers PFP tokens to burn their ERC721 to redeem the original ERC404 that the ERC721 was minted with (retaining the rarity and token ID). A small cleaning fee (0.00042069 ETH, updatable by governance) is charged, and this mechanism can also be used for regenerating/rerolling or ‚Äòrecycling‚Äô, Dumpster Diver PFPs to get the desired traits.

We have grown to 185 holders and have generated $44k from trade fees (50% of which is $TRASH and 100% of which is reinvested in providing liquidity for our pools), and 1,654,148 DEGEN (~$40k) from liquidity mining rewards. We were also a finalist in the Backdrop Build V3 Accelerator Program (top 5% of applicants). 

Trash NFTs have built an effective machine: by owning the LPs that facilitate the swaps into $TRASH we capture 1% of the volume and store that in our treasury. We have two liquidity pools: 1) TRASH/ETH and 2) TRASH/ DEGEN, the rapidly growing meme token with utility in the Farcaster network and beyond. This exposes Trash NFTs to volatility, which generates more revenue because arbitrage bots stabilize the price across pools. 

Trash NFTs is also governed by a DAO called Waste Management that was initially allocated 20% of all $TRASH tokens. This DAO collects the cleaning fees associated with trait rerolls as well as the transaction fees and LP rewards from its DeFi activities. Finally, Trash NFTs has entered the meatspace by hosting a trash pickup event during Farcon 2024 with /humankind. 

We are proud of Trash NFTs, as it has maintained and proven to be a sound investment for its holder base while operating successfully. There are definite improvements we continue working toward: 1) expanding growth efforts to the broader 404 ecosystem with partnerships (such as Scattering.io with which we have built a relationship) and promotion, 2) revamping The Dumpster website for a more seamless experience and 3) engaging the community to take leadership in expanding the DAO.

name: Tribuni Telegram Bot
description:
Who We Are

Tribuni was born out of the ETH Denver hackathon, spearheaded by a team of decentralized governance practitioners. Our founding members include delegates from Blockchain@USC actively participating in Optimism's governance. With expertise spanning software engineering, product design, and product management across both Web2 and crypto landscapes, our diverse team is dedicated to enhancing the delegate experience.

Our Story

Being a delegate requires constantly staying up-to-date due to the sheer volume of information that needs to be digested. Before Tribuni, we experienced firsthand the challenges of managing extensive data and keeping track of vital governance activities. To address this pain point, we engaged with a wide range of delegates from groups such as 404DAO, Brichis, PGov, Launamu, FranklinDAO, etc. Their insights and feedback inspired us to build a tool tailored specifically for delegates like them.

Our Solution

Delegates are the cornerstone of Optimism's governance system. Active and well-informed delegates lead to resilient and sound governance. However, delegates need to process a lot of information and often find it challenging to stay up-to-date. We are humans after all.

To help delegates stay active and well-informed, our team launched Tribuni‚Äîa free Telegram mini-app built exclusively for delegates. Tribuni sends quality AI-generated proposal summaries, vote reminders, and OP forum activity digests directly via Telegram. This ensures that delegates never miss a vote or an important discussion within the OP ecosystem, as long as they're connected to Telegram.

Impact

As of September 2024, Tribuni proudly supports 28 OP delegate profiles, encompassing a staggering 28,217,127 votes combined. This substantial vote power not only surpasses Optimism's 26 million quorum but also underscores Tribuni's pivotal role in the governance ecosystem. Our platform serves 38 dedicated Optimism subscribers, including influential entities like PGOV, blockchain@USC, 404DAO, PGov, Gauntlet, Tane Gov, etc who manage multiple delegate memberships. Through Tribuni, we help them analyzed 1,113 posts across 186 forum topics, ensuring they remain well-informed and proactive in decision-making. By seamlessly integrating into their workflows, Tribuni has become an indispensable tool, empowering delegates to govern more effectively and maintain the resilience of Optimism's governance structure.

name: Unitap
description:
The easiest path to onboard users into web3 networks and communities.

Blockchain networks struggle to acquire new users. The competition is fierce! 

It‚Äôs hard enough to get exposure to a targeted audience interested in learning about a new blockchain network and its Dapps. It‚Äôs even harder to convert them into users when there is more friction than incentives in the onboarding process. Even worse, hundreds of networks are launching every year making it even more challenging to attract and retain new users.
Unitap aims to change this. 

In Unitap anyone will be able to learn about Web3 from zero, find new networks and dapps, learn how to use them with how-to-do videos, get free gas drips to get started, and do missions to get rewarded for using new products, ALL IN ONE PLACE. Additionally, Unitap is Sybil-resistant therefore all new users will be unique and the incentives won‚Äôt be drained by bots or bad actors. 

Most future web3 users have not been onboarded yet, these users will come through the path of least resistance and more incentives. Unitap is optimizing for offering both.

Unitap has deployed Gas Tap, Token Tap, and Prize Tap on Optimism.

Gas Tap: Unique humans can obtain tiny amounts of gas tokens to get started on Optimism. X claims.

Token Tap: Anyone can distribute any kind of tokens gated by the requirements they wish. Unitap distributed OP as incentives to anyone who claimed from the Gas Tap as a PoC and Glo Dollar distributed 500 USDGLO on Optimism using Token Tap.

Prize Tap: Anyone can create raffles and gate them with the requirements they want. Glo Dollar used the Prize Tap contract in Optimism to distribute three 100 USDGLO prizes to users that sent at least 0.1 USDGLO to friends in Optimism.

name: Updraft
description:
What is Cyfrin Updraft?
Cyfrin Updraft is the leading blockchain development and smart contract security education platform, offering over 100+ hours of hands-on courses that enable aspiring and experienced smart contract developers to level up their skills. Designed and taught by CEO Patrick Collins alongside industry-leading educators and researchers, our platform provides high-quality, free educational content, hands-on coding experiences, and industry-recognized Cyfrin Updraft Certifications, which verify developers‚Äô expertise in Solidity, Vyper, DeFi, and smart contract security.

Updraft has educated millions of developers globally, equipping them with the skills necessary to build secure and scalable decentralized applications. 

Key Metrics:
220K+ Updraft community members
1M+ Monthly impressions
60K+ Monthly active developers
15K+ Monthly new students
Trusted by developers from top Web3 companies and protocols

What are the Issues with the Existing Web3 Landscape?
Despite the rapid growth of Web3, developers face several challenges:
- Lack of accessible, high-quality education: Most resources are either too theoretical or fragmented, making it difficult for developers to gain practical experience.
- Security vulnerabilities: Many developers lack the knowledge to build secure smart contracts, leading to exploits and hacks that result in millions in losses.
- High entry barriers for Web2 developers: The transition from traditional development to Web3 remains complex due to unfamiliarity with blockchain infrastructure and tooling.
- Limited developer retention: Many developers struggle to find long-term engagement opportunities within blockchain ecosystems. 
- No standardized skill validation: Without recognized certifications, it is difficult for developers to showcase their expertise, limiting their career opportunities.
- Lack of security best practices: Without proper training and certification, developers may unknowingly introduce vulnerabilities, increasing the risk of hacks.

How Is Cyfrin Updraft Fixing the Issue?
Cyfrin Updraft addresses these challenges by providing:
- Comprehensive blockchain development education: Covering Solidity, Vyper, Foundry, infrastructure, security best practices, and more.
- Project-based learning: Developers gain hands-on experience by building and deploying real-world applications.
- Security-first approach: Courses emphasize smart contract security, audit methodologies, and best practices to prevent exploits.
- Developer tooling and ecosystem integrations: We create open-source tools and frameworks that enhance developer efficiency and security.
- Bridging Web2 and Web3: Providing structured learning paths to onboard Web2 developers into Optimism‚Äôs ecosystem.
- Completely free access: Updraft courses are entirely free, ensuring that any developer, regardless of financial constraints, can access high-quality education and build the skills needed to succeed in Web3.
- Validation of Skills: Certifications provide a standardized way to verify a developer‚Äôs expertise, helping them stand out in a competitive job market.

Who is Cyfrin Updraft For?
+ Aspiring Web3 Developers - For newcomers eager to break into blockchain development, Cyfrin Updraft provides a structured and accessible learning path. Our courses start with fundamental concepts, gradually building up to advanced smart contract development, security topics, full stack development, infrastructure development and advanced DeFi dApp development . With hands-on coding exercises, real-world project deployments, and Cyfrin Updraft Certifications, aspiring developers can establish themselves in the industry, build secure and scalable dApp, and demonstrate their skills to potential employers.
+ Experienced Web3 Engineers - For developers already working in the Web3 space, Cyfrin Updraft serves as a hub for continuous learning and skill enhancement. Advanced courses on smart contract security, DeFi mechanisms, and protocol architecture help engineers stay ahead of industry trends. Our Cyfrin Updraft Certifications validate expertise in Solidity, Vyper, and security best practices, distinguishing top engineers in a competitive job market. 
+ Web2 Developers - Traditional software engineers looking to transition into blockchain development often struggle with understanding decentralized technologies and smart contract principles. Cyfrin Updraft bridges this gap by providing a structured, Web2-friendly onboarding experience. Our courses explain blockchain fundamentals in a way that resonates with Web2 developers, drawing parallels between familiar programming concepts and smart contract development. For example, we‚Äôve developed a Vyper Smart Contract Development course specifically to support onboarding Web2 developers, ensuring they gain hands-on experience with secure and efficient smart contract programming. This approach aligns with Updraft‚Äôs mission to scale Web3 adoption by equipping developers with the knowledge and tools they need to seamlessly transition into the decentralized ecosystem.
+ Protocol and dApp Teams - Organizations need skilled developers who understand smart contract security, scalability, and best practices. Cyfrin Updraft helps protocol teams and dApp builders by providing a reliable pipeline of trained, certified engineers. Through Cyfrin Updraft Certifications, hiring teams can verify a candidate‚Äôs expertise, reducing onboarding time and improving the quality of development within their projects. Additionally, protocols can collaborate with Cyfrin Updraft to develop custom training programs, ensuring their developer communities are well-versed in their technology stack.

What is the Roadmap for Cyfrin Updraft?
Q1 2025: Courses & Foundational Expansion
1. Launch a Full Stack Development Course
This course will provide a comprehensive learning experience for developers looking to build dApps from the ground up.
The course covers modern frontend frameworks (React, Next.js, Svelte), Web3 libraries (ethers.js, viem, wagmi), and backend infrastructure (site hosting, event indexing, caching strategies). 
Developers will build real-world projects, including a basic Ethereum dApp, a decentralized NFT marketplace, and an advanced DeFi interface with account abstraction.
2. Launch Curve Cryptoswap Course
A deep dive into the mechanics of Curve Finance‚Äôs automated market maker (AMM) designed for stablecoin swaps.
The course will explore the math supporting Curve Cryptoswap‚Äôs AMM, how liquidity is concentrated, and how the AMM decides to repeg the pool's liquidity at a different price.
Developers will progress through AMM function calls, state variables, swapping tokens, adding and removing liquidity, and price-repegging. The learning is supported at every stage with quizzes and exercises.
3. Launch Uniswap V3 Course
This course will focus on Uniswap V3‚Äôs concentrated liquidity model, fee tiers, and capital efficiency improvements.
An advanced DeFi developer course designed to enable developers to build Uniswap V3-based protocols
The course covers Uniswap V3 math and concentrated liquidity, progressing through swaps and the factory contract, the fee algorithms, and the TWAP price oracle.
4. Launch SSCD+ (Smart Contract Security & Development) Certifications
SSCD+ Certification is the premier certification for Solidity developers, recognized by industry-leading protocols and university organizations. This certification validates developers‚Äô expertise in writing, testing, deploying, and troubleshooting Solidity smart contracts.
Key skills that developers will be tested include proficiency in Solidity development, application of industry best practices, smart contract security expertise, mastery of industry-standard development tools, protocol-specific knowledge, blockchain DevOps skills

Q2 2025: Advanced Security & Infrastructure Expansion
1. Launch an Updraft Ambassador Program
The program will empower university students and community leaders to advocate for Web3 and Cyfrin Updraft, engage developers, host workshops and hackathons on campuses and in developer communities.
Ambassadors will receive early access to Updraft certifications and mentorship from the Updraft team.
Through Updraft's ecosystem, students will gain practical experience in blockchain education, networking opportunities, and potential internships or job placements.
2. Blockchain and Smart Contract Curriculum for Universities
Updraft will collaborate with top universities to integrate blockchain and smart contract development courses into academic curriculums.
This will include customized coursework, hands-on projects, and guest lectures from Web3 industry leaders.
Universities will be able to provide blockchain education at scale, helping bridge the gap between traditional computer science education and Web3 development.
3. Launch a Jobs Board
The Updraft Jobs Board will connect certified developers with leading Web3 companies and protocols.
Developers who complete Updraft‚Äôs courses and certifications will have access to job listings and hiring opportunities.
Employers will be able to filter candidates based on certifications and project experience, making the hiring process more efficient.
4. Launch Vyper and Smart Contract Security+ Certification Program
Vyper+ Certification is a specialized certification focused on smart contract development using Vype. This program will cover Vyper syntax, best practices, contract patterns, and optimization techniques, ensuring developers can build secure and efficient Vyper-based applications.
Smart Contract Security+ Certification is a security-focused certification that validates a developer‚Äôs ability to audit and secure smart contracts written in Solidity. This program will cover common vulnerabilities, formal verification, attack vectors, auditing methodologies, and best practices.

Q3 2025: Developer Engagement & Retention
1. Launch an Infrastructure Development Course
This course will focus on blockchain infrastructure, node operations, and MEV-related optimizations.
Developers will learn how to build and run their own validators, set up RPC nodes, and optimize blockchain indexing. They will also gain a deep understanding of key Web3 infrastructure components, explore Layer 2 architecture, build custom L2 solutions, and evaluate infrastructure architecture trade-offs.
2. Launch Live Cohort Learning Model
Cyfrin Updraft will introduce 8-week intensive live cohorts, where students will work through the curriculum alongside mentors, teaching assistants, and AI-driven learning support.
Each cohort will focus on hands-on, project-based learning, ensuring participants gain practical experience building and securing Web3 applications.
By the end of the cohort, students will earn Updraft certifications and have portfolio-ready projects to showcase their skills.

Q4 2025: Web2 to Web3 Expansion & Industry Integration
1. Expand Integration with Enterprise Use Cases
Updraft will develop tailored educational programs for enterprise developers, helping businesses adopt blockchain technology.
This will involve customized workshops, tooling integration guides, and real-world enterprise case studies.
The goal is to bridge the gap between traditional Web2 development and Web3 innovation, making it easier for institutional developers to enter the space.

name: Upnode Deploy
description:
Upnode Deploy allows chain operators and developers to quickly launch their OP Stack chain with the necessary infrastructure, including an explorer, bridge, faucet, and monitoring system, by modifying a few environment variables related to the RPC endpoint, private keys, and chain information.

With a single Docker Compose command, they can launch and manage every component of the OP Stack chain, including the ability to deploy a replica node by providing `rollup.json` and `genesis.json`. Upnode Deploy also offers a user interface similar to Conduit, which simplifies the OP Stack deployment process.

Unlike Conduit, Upnode Deploy provides developers and chain operators with a tool to deploy OP Stack chains on their own servers instead of relying on third-party managed servers. Upnode Deploy is free, open-source, and fully transparent, whereas Conduit is a paid, closed-source solution.

Upnode Deploy supports the latest OP Stack v1.9.0 and is prepared for the upcoming migration from `pnpm` to `just`.

Upnode Deploy has won Fraxtal Hackathon: https://dorahacks.io/buidl/13971

Video of docker compose deploying an OP Stack L3 on Fraxtal: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8dytrXGjDG4

name: Voting Influence and Concentration Analysis (VICA) for Optimism Collective
description: This project is for an Optimism Foundation Mission Request: Measuring the Concentration of Power within the Collective. The Voting Influence and Concentration Analysis (VICA) is a systematic approach to estimating the voting bloc's marginal influence on voting outcomes and measuring the degree of concentration in the voting system. This method, specifically tailored for the Optimism Collective, leverages logistic regression, counterfactual analysis, and data augmentation to deliver a robust and comprehensive understanding of each voting bloc's explicit and implicit influence on the voting process.

name: Voting-Bloc Entropy (VBE)
description:
We are a group of academic researchers who have devised Voting-Bloc Entropy (VBE, pronounced "vibe"), a new metric for decentralization in DAOs. We have worked collaboratively with the Optimism Foundation to provide a toolkit to measure VBE in both the Citizens House and Token House to study their levels of decentralization. We have also released a public dashboard measuring VBE across DAOs. (Optimism Collective, as it turns out, ranks #1, i.e., has the highest VBE.)

We can't build truly equitable and durable DAOs unless we understand the meaning of the 'D' in DAO‚Äîthe decentralization part‚Äîand can measure it. Existing metrics‚Äîthe Nakamoto coefficient, the Gini coefficient, etc.‚Äîhave a number of shortcomings. We have proposed a new metric, called voting-block entropy (VBE)‚Äîpronounced "vibe." It measures decentralization in a principled way that avoids the pitfalls of previous metrics and better reflects intuitive notions of decentralization, such as diversity of opinions, credible neutrality, etc.

VBE additionally offers practical guidance for DAO administrators and users. Using VBE as a theoretical foundation, we have proven a number of basic theorems about ways to increase VBE and thus improve decentralization. 

Our work on VBE has involved strong collaboration with the Optimism Foundation (OF). In consultation with the OF, we have developed tools for the OF (and other projects) for measuring VBE. We have shared the resulting code for the Optimism-specific VBE toolkit with the Optimism Foundation for their use in analysis of the Optimism DAOs. We have also created a public dashboard at https://tinyurl.com/y2ftwavu that includes up-to-date VBE measurements for a number of major DAOs in the ecosystem. (Optimism, as it turns out, is currently #1, i.e., exhibits the highest VBE.)

Our team consists of researchers associated with Ari Juels's group at Cornell Tech.

name: Vrbs
description:
Vrbs is a new take on the Nouns protocol where you can earn a vote for your efforts.

At a high level, Vrbs is a fork of Nouns. One Vrb is auctioned off every day, forever. Proceeds fund a shared treasury. Vrbs takes the meme machine pioneered by Nouns and adds more accessible incentive mechanisms. That way, more people can own votes.

The first major difference is the art. Anyone can create the next Vrb.

Vrbs are original art pieces. Artists create and upload art on vrbs.build. Art pieces are fully onchain SVGs.

The community picks their favorite art, and the top voted piece is auctioned off as the next Vrb to the highest bidder.

The artist behind each Vrb earns 50% of the auction proceeds in ETH and voting power.

Artists from all around the world create Vrbs and earn votes in the Vrbs movement.

Anyone contributing time and energy to Vrbs has an avenue to grow their say in the movement.

Through the daily auction, a new member and artist get votes in Vrbs. Artists are able to do what they do best, and earn votes in the process.

This is just the tip of the iceberg. Imagine you build a business on the Vrbs brand. Split revenue with Vrbs, earn votes, and incentivize consumers who can earn votes for their purchases as well.

Anyone who builds on Vrbs now has an accessible entrypoint to earn a vote. As the movement scales, all new members can get votes and start growing their stake in Vrbs.

Vrbs is a grassroots onchain movement, owned by the people building it.

Got error: "Transaction not sent by deployer" when verifying contracts. Contracts available here:
https://vrbs.build/vrbs?viewContracts=true

description:

Version Downloads Installs Rating

Solidity is the language used in Ethereum to create smart contracts, this extension provides:

Syntax highlighting
Snippets
Compilation of the current contract (Press F1 Solidity : Compile Current Solidity Contract), or F5
Compilation of all the contracts (Press F1 Solidity : Compile all Solidity Contracts), or Ctrl + F5 or Cmd + F5
Code completion for all contracts / libraries in the current file and all referenced imports
Goto definition
Find all references in project
Hover information
Code actions / quick fixes (change compiler, format address, add sdpx license.. )
Mono repo support (identifies the project by finding the files: remappings.txt, foundry.toml, brownie-config.yaml, truffle-config.js, hardhat.config.js, hardhat.config.ts)
Default project structure (solidity files needs to be in the src/ directory, and libraries in the lib/ directory). Libraries will follow the same structure.

name: Vudy
description:
We are Vudy, a modular, non-custodial financial infrastructure designed for a borderless world. Built by U3 Tech, Vudy empowers global users to move value seamlessly, transparently, and securely, without relying on legacy intermediaries or bloated financial platforms. 

At its core, Vudy is a Simple Modular Technology (STeM in Spanish) platform that allows users to activate only the tools they need, no more, no less. With Vudy users can create payment Requests through shareable links, making it easy to receive funds across borders without intermediaries. Our Deploy feature enables automated, multi-recipient transfers, perfect for payrolls, grants or DAOs managing batch transactions. And with our OTC Ramps, users can access on/off ramps through direct over the counter liquidity partners, simplifying the conversion between fiat and crypto at a democratized fair price. 

Our mission is to eliminate borders, delays, and hidden fees from digital value movement by leveraging blockchain technology with a user first mindset. We believe that financial infrastructure should be as composable as code, and as accessible as messaging apps. With compliance tools built directly into our stack and real time on chain transparency, we‚Äôre making financial freedom possible and practical.

We are a passionate team of developers, designers, and strategists based across Latin America, crafting the future of finance for the many, not the few. Grounded in regional realities, but aiming for global transformation, we are excited to bring our vision to Optimism and help redefine what financial inclusion truly means.

name: WakeUp Labs | Rollup-as-a-Service for the OP Stack
description:
We are WakeUp Labs, a software development company focused on building open-source infrastructure for the Ethereum ecosystem and the Superchain. Our team has been working closely with the OP Stack to deliver a fully open and modular Rollup-as-a-Service (RaaS) solution.

Our RaaS tooling simplifies the deployment, management, and customization of rollups on Optimism. It includes a CLI, a web console, and deployment pipelines designed to empower developers and protocols to launch their own rollups quickly and securely‚Äîwithout needing to manage DevOps or low-level infra.

We believe the future of Ethereum scalability lies in modular rollups, and we're building the tools to make that future accessible to everyone. Our tools are already being used by projects and contributors in the Optimism ecosystem to explore new rollup use cases and accelerate Superchain adoption.

We‚Äôre committed to pushing forward the decentralization and usability of rollup infrastructure‚Äîaligned with Optimism‚Äôs values and mission.

name: WannaBet
description: WannaBet is an onchain peer-to-peer social betting tool that enables two parties to enter into a wager and escrow the parties‚Äô funds in a noncustodial smart contract. description:
WannaBet is an onchain peer-to-peer social betting tool that enables two parties to enter into a wager and escrow the parties‚Äô funds in a noncustodial smart contract. The funds then can only be released by a designated third-party judge who determines the wager's outcome.

name: WAVE - N3XTWAVE Collective inaugural drop
description:
WAVE was the inaugural drop of N3XTWAVE Collective, which I initiated and organized in September last year. The theme for this drop was discussed collectively, with ‚ÄòWAVE‚Äô theme proposed by Francoise Gamma, strongly inspired by our collective's name. ‚ÄòWAVE‚Äô, representing an impactful force, seemed perfect for a collective drop as it symbolizes our coming together for a simultaneous mint. It also conveys the idea of constant motion, which reflects the ever-evolving Web3 and NFT markets that we actively shape every day.
Given its multiple meanings, we decided to keep the theme open to interpretation for each artist. Each member of the collective created their own ‚ÄòWAVE‚Äô - some more literal, others more metaphorical or abstract - each in their personal artistic style and chosen technique. As a result, we have built a collection that is stylistically diverse, ranging from minimalistic and linear to pixelated and glitch aesthetics, making it versatile and appealing to a wide range of tastes. 
Since collaborative contracts were not available on Zora at that time, this drop functions as a collection tied together by a shared art statement that I wrote, which is included in the description of each mint. Here it is:
‚ÄøÔ∏µ‚ÄøÔ∏µ‚ÄøÔ∏µ
WAVE reflects the essence of our collective, signifying our unity through a synchronized mint.
WAVE embodies a powerful force, representing our aspirations as a fresh and influential art group to make a significant impact on the current art scene.
WAVE signifies perpetual motion, mirroring the ever-evolving landscape of Web3 that we actively shape everyday.
Each WAVE mint from N3XTWAVE Collective is a ripple sparking waves of inspiration and creativity, expanding the horizons of artistic expression.
Join us in making waves by minting the WAVE Drop!
‚ñ†‚ñ†‚ñ† About N3XTWAVE:‚ñ†‚ñ†‚ñ† N3XTWAVE is an art collective started by artist bleu281 in June 2023. He brought together a small group of visual artists of various generations, styles, backgrounds, and nationalities, yet all based in Europe. United by our exploration of the digital medium, we all experiment with pixels through modern and abandoned digital techniques. 
As of today, N3XTWAVE consists of 17 members from countries including: France, Germany, Poland, Spain, Italy, the UK, Ireland, and the Czech Republic. 
‚ñ†‚ñ†‚ñ† 
Full details & credits of the WAVE drop: ‚óÜ Initiative, Organizing & Art Statement: V5MT ‚óÜ Promo - Animated Flyers: V5MT ‚óÜ WAVE theme suggestion: Francoise Gamma ‚óÜ N3XTWAVE Animated Logos: Francoise Gamma ‚óÜ PR: V5MT, Ugo Digi ‚óÜ Release Date: September 18th 2023 ‚óÜ Platform: zora.co ‚óÜ Network: ZORA ‚óÜ Artists: Ugo Digi, Bleu281, V5MT, Danctrl, Francoise Gamma, Datura, Lucas Lejeune, mostwrongking, Nicholas Dietrich,  k0ch, Element Lee.
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚¨•‚îÄ‚îÄ 
Notes: 
‚¨•I'm submitting this project from my personal Farcaster account, not N3XTWAVE, which I also set up, but didn't have time to manage.‚¨• Because Zora had no collaborative contracts at the time of the drop, I'm linking to my Mirror article with all the minted pieces embedded, instead of to Zora. + I also included a link to the 'WAVE Drop Organizing' essay I released on Mirror, where I describe the process of organizing this project in detail.‚¨•I plan to share the potential reward from this submission and distribute it to the artists accordingly.

name: Web3 Hackers Collective
description:
The Web3 Hackers Collective (W3HC) is a DAO created on February 24, 2023. It is deployed to Optimism. 

Our mission statement is:

"We want to build integrations through mentoring and learning."

Instead of reinventing the wheel from hackathons to hackathons, our approach is to identify relevant Web3 integrations to achieve, and to seize these opportunities to do as much mentoring as possible.

Any proposal submitted to the DAO should meet one of the following criteria:

- Organize local hackathons, workshops and meetups
- Request retroactive funding for a successful integration
- Develop and maintain Gov: a DAO framework built with Governor and NFTs
- Help people to setup their own DAO

We're a team of four (Theo, Bertrand, Olivier and Julien), we developed several projects including: 

- Gov: DAOs for everyday people. A DAO framework built with Governor and NFTs. https://github.com/w3hc/gov
- Pattini: a GitHub Action designed to incentivise and reward contributors of a GitHub project. When an issue is merged by a maintainer, the pull request author automatically receives a certain amount of ERC-20 (USDC, DAI, ...). https://github.com/w3hc/pattini
- Web3DD: a classic file explorer to manage your files and directories in a safe and decentralized fashion. https://github.com/w3hc/web3dd
- Genji: a Next.js Web3 app template. https://github.com/w3hc/genji
- w3hc-hardhat-template: a Hardhat template that includes Typescript, Ethers v6, OpenZeppelin Contracts v5.0.2, Hardhat Verify plugin, Hardhat Deploy plugin. https://github.com/w3hc/w3hc-hardhat-template

With over 250 AI-generated smart contracts already deployed and verified across different EVM networks, it's proving its capability in the Web3 ecosystem. The platform also supports specialized AI Agents designed for specific functionalities, enhancing your development experience by making it more efficient and tailored to your needs.

name: Web3j
description:
Web3j is the Java and Android integration library for Ethereum.

Created in 2016, and still going strong in 2025 it is core plumbing to Ethereum for one of the world's most widely used development platforms, the JVM.

It has been downloaded millions of times, and is used by everyone including
- Enterprises such as J.P. Morgan, Fnality and NTT Data
- Web3 infrastructure companies such as Alchemy 
- The Besu Ethereum Execution client
- It's even been integrated natively into the Android OS by Freedom Factory in ethOS which powers the  upcoming Ethereum phone the DGEN1

We decided in 2024 to bring Web3j into the Hyperledger Foundation, which provides high-quality governance of open source (similar to the Apache Foundation). It's still, the same team at Web3 Labs responsible for maintaining and supporting the library for its wide and varied user base. The Hyperledger association is great for visibility, but doesn't provide any funding for the project!

We had success in OP RPGF 2, but missed out on OP RPGF 3 as we had not realised projects were eligible for multiple RPGF rounds!

We rely on grant funding to sustain this library and hope to qualify for this RPGF round.

üôè
