name: WebHash.com
description:
Webhash.com is a no-code platform designed to empower users to create tokenised, decentralised, and permanent websites seamlessly. Targeting both ENS (Ethereum Name Service) and traditional DNS domains, users can build and deploy robust websites without any coding knowledge, ensuring their web presence is tamper-proof and enduring. These websites are deployed on IPFS (InterPlanetary File System) and tokenised on Base, providing enhanced security, immutability, and ownership verification, setting a new standard in website development and management.

Tokenisation: Each website created on Webhash.com is tokenised on the Base blockchain. This means that every website is represented by a unique token, ensuring clear ownership and provenance. Tokenisation allows for easy transfer and trading of website ownership, creating a seamless and secure way to manage web properties.

Decentralisation: By deploying websites on IPFS, Webhash.com leverages a distributed network of nodes to store and serve content. This decentralised approach eliminates single points of failure, making websites more resilient to censorship and server outages. It ensures that the content remains accessible as long as the network exists, without relying on any central authority.

Permanence: The combination of IPFS and Filecoin ensures that websites are permanent and immutable. Once content is added to IPFS, it is distributed across multiple nodes, making it tamper-proof. Our smart contract on base provides an immutable ledger of ownership and changes, guaranteeing that once a website is created and tokenised, its history and content cannot be altered or erased.

Permanence: The combination of IPFS and Filecoin ensures that websites are permanent and immutable. Once content is added to IPFS, it is distributed across multiple nodes, making it tamper-proof. Our smart contract on base provides an immutable ledger of ownership and changes, guaranteeing that once a website is created and tokenised, its history and content cannot be altered or erased.

üìà Our Growth in Numbers:
User Engagement: We've welcomed over 3,045 users, a testament to the growing interest and trust in decentralised web solutions.
Website Creations: Our platform has enabled the creation of 4,527 decentralised websites, showcasing the diverse applications and creativity of our community.
Storage Expansion: We're now utilising 95 GB on IPFS, highlighting our commitment to robust and decentralised storage solutions.

Partnerships: 

In our continuous effort to enhance and expand the capabilities of Webhash within the ENS ecosystem, we've taken significant strides in integrating products build within the ENS ecosystem that empower our users and their decentralised creations. 

üåê Eth.limo: Eth.limo has become an integral part of the Webhash ecosystem, providing a seamless way to access decentralised websites with a ".limo" extension. This integration means every decentralised website created on Webhash is automatically generated with a .limo extension, ensuring a uniform and recognizable domain system for users and visitors alike. Furthermore, all content created on Webhash is pinned on Eth.limo's IPFS node, which not only enhances the reliability and speed of content delivery but also strengthens the decentralised nature of our hosting solutions.

Our collaboration with Eth.limo is further enhanced through the integration of Eth.limo's API, including their Domain over HTTPS (DoH) API, into the Webhash ENS website resolver (browser extension). This advanced integration leverages @ethlimo.eth‚Äôs DoH API to efficiently fetch the corresponding IPFS hash or Arweave link associated with a .eth domain. This capability streamlines the process of linking ENS domains to their corresponding decentralised content, ensuring a seamless and efficient resolution system for decentralised web access. 

üåç Namespace: With the integration of Namespace, users can mint subdomains directly on Webhash, offering a layer of personalization and organisation to their decentralised web presence. These subdomains provide a scalable way for users to categorise, manage, and deploy multiple decentralised websites under a unified domain structure, further enriching the Webhash ecosystem.

üîÑ Ethereum Follow Protocol (EFP): In an exciting development, we're implementing a new feature that allows users to showcase their Ethereum Follow Protocol (EFP) numbers directly on their decentralised websites. This block, when added to a site on Webhash, not only highlights the user's engagement within the Ethereum community but also fosters a sense of connectivity and social proof among decentralised web participants. The Ethereum Follow Protocol integration signifies our commitment to leveraging blockchain technology not just for hosting but also for community building and engagement.

üî® Community Engagement through Buildathons: Our mission to ignite active participation within the ENS community has led to the creation of decentralised websites for ENS domains through Webhash. Our Buildathons, including collaborations like frENS, are key to empowering individuals to develop innovative decentralised digital identities.

Buildathon 1: We gave $1000 to five winners who build decentralised websites
Buildathon 2: Done in collaboration with frENS. We gave $1000 to five winners who build decentralised websites.
Buildathon 3: Still in progress we a giving $1200 to five winners


Key features of Webhash: 

No-Code Interface: We've created a no-code, user-friendly interface that makes building decentralised websites accessible to everyone, regardless of technical expertise.
Versatile Content Creation & Integration: Our platform at Webhash enriches the ENS domain experience by enabling users to create a broad spectrum of content types with seamless integrations. We have designed a user-friendly interface that allows for the addition of various standard elements such as avatars with diverse styles, engaging headings, informative paragraphs, and external links, all of which enhance the user's webpage. The integration capabilities of our platform include a suite of options that cater to different media types and functionalities:

Social Media Integration: Users can showcase their social presence with icons linked to their profiles on platforms like Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and more, fostering engagement directly from their ENS dwebsite.

Multimedia Content: Embedding capabilities for platforms like YouTube, Vimeo, Twitch, Spotify, and SoundCloud allow users to share a wide range of audiovisual content, from music tracks and podcasts to videos and livestreams.

Web3 activity blocks: Integrated key web3 projects like Farcaster and POAP so that users can showcase their web3 activity. 

Interactive Features: Inclusion of interactive elements such as image sliders, RSS feeds, countdown widgets, and forms elevates the user experience by engaging visitors with dynamic content.
Content Distribution: Our platform supports file sharing directly from the page, whether it‚Äôs audio files, PDF documents, or any downloadable content, making it a versatile tool for content distribution.
Communication and Sharing: Integration of communication tools like Discord servers and call-to-action prompts encourages community building and interaction. Additionally, our VCard feature enables users to share contact information in a professional manner.

Monetization: We've integrated payment solutions like PayPal, enabling users to collect payments for products, services, or donations directly through their ENS decentralised website.

Customization: Advanced customization with custom HTML/CSS/JS and Markdown formatting allows for unique content creation. 

Credibility and Engagement: By adding customer reviews and FAQs, users can build credibility and provide valuable information to their audience.

The combination of these features on the Webhash platform not only empowers users to create comprehensive 'link-in-bio' pages but also extends to more complex decentralised website formats such as blogs, portfolios, and business landing pages. Each feature is designed to be intuitive and easy to use, ensuring that even those with no coding skills can build a professional and aesthetically pleasing online presence on the decentralised web.

Seamless ENS and DNS Domain Connections: We've streamlined the process of connecting ENS and traditional DNS domains to decentralised websites, making it hassle-free and efficient.
Collaboration with ETH.limo: We've partnered with ETH.limo to ensure optimal speed and availability for the decentralised websites hosted on our platform.

Monetization Through NFTs: We've innovated in monetization by allowing users to mint their website designs as NFTs, creating new economic opportunities within the ENS ecosystem.
Arweave Integration: Our integration with Arweave enables a persistent web presence, ensuring durability and longevity of the content.

Setting Resolvers for Domains: We've simplified the process of setting resolvers for ENS domains, addressing a common challenge faced by users.

Subdomain and Wrapped Domain Support: We've Introduced support for both subdomains and wrapped domains. This feature lets users build and manage a network of decentralised websites under one ENS domain. Whether it‚Äôs for different projects, services, or varied content types, our users can now efficiently organise their online presence.

Interactive Features: Inclusion of interactive elements such as image sliders, RSS feeds, countdown widgets, and forms elevates the user experience by engaging visitors with dynamic content.
Content Distribution: Our platform supports file sharing directly from the page, whether it‚Äôs audio files, PDF documents, or any downloadable content, making it a versatile tool for content distribution.
Communication and Sharing: Integration of communication tools like Discord servers and call-to-action prompts encourages community building and interaction. Additionally, our VCard feature enables users to share contact information in a professional manner.

Monetization: We've integrated payment solutions like PayPal, enabling users to collect payments for products, services, or donations directly through their ENS decentralised website.

Customization: Advanced customization with custom HTML/CSS/JS and Markdown formatting allows for unique content creation. 

Credibility and Engagement: By adding customer reviews and FAQs, users can build credibility and provide valuable information to their audience.

The combination of these features on the Webhash platform not only empowers users to create comprehensive 'link-in-bio' pages but also extends to more complex decentralised website formats such as blogs, portfolios, and business landing pages. Each feature is designed to be intuitive and easy to use, ensuring that even those with no coding skills can build a professional and aesthetically pleasing online presence on the decentralised web.

Seamless ENS and DNS Domain Connections: We've streamlined the process of connecting ENS and traditional DNS domains to decentralised websites, making it hassle-free and efficient.
Collaboration with ETH.limo: We've partnered with ETH.limo to ensure optimal speed and availability for the decentralised websites hosted on our platform.

Monetization Through NFTs: We've innovated in monetization by allowing users to mint their website designs as NFTs, creating new economic opportunities within the ENS ecosystem.
Arweave Integration: Our integration with Arweave enables a persistent web presence, ensuring durability and longevity of the content.

Setting Resolvers for Domains: We've simplified the process of setting resolvers for ENS domains, addressing a common challenge faced by users.

Subdomain and Wrapped Domain Support: We've Introduced support for both subdomains and wrapped domains. This feature lets users build and manage a network of decentralised websites under one ENS domain. Whether it‚Äôs for different projects, services, or varied content types, our users can now efficiently organise their online presence.

name: WhaleForce
description:
WhaleForce is an analytics project designed to track, interpret, and surface meaningful insights from high-value wallet activity across major L2s‚Äîstarting with Optimism. Leveraging tools like Arkham, EigenPhi, and Dune, the project focuses on identifying patterns in whale behavior, early movements into ecosystems, and capital flows that precede major DeFi events. The goal is to create an open dashboard and periodic deep-dive reports that help the community understand how large actors interact with Optimism, and what it might signal for builders, traders, and protocol teams.

We‚Äôre starting with a curated list of key addresses and will progressively expand coverage as we gather feedback. Data will be shared openly, with a bias toward transparency over speculation.

name: WhatsABI
description:
Extract ABI (and more) from EVM bytecode, even without source code.

WhatsABI is a public good for making EVM bytecode more useful and usable on all EVM-based chains, such as mainnet and OP Stack chains.

The guiding purpose for WhatsABI is to improve decentralization, transparency, and user safety by reducing our dependence on proprietary centralized frontends for EVM contracts. 

WhatsABI a permissively-licensed TypeScript library that is perfect for building better contract explorers (a better Etherscan), transaction builders (Safe Wallet), smarter wallets (MetaMask, Zapper), and for doing security research. It is designed to be small, fast, and easily embedded in wallets or runnable locally with any provider.

WhatsABI is already powering many popular projects like Otterscan, Sourcify, Rivet, Ondora, Thirdweb, and more coming soon as we collaborate on integrations upstream.

name: Whimsical Euphoria: A White Inflatable Sheep
description: My girlfriend has a passion for AI-generated art and created an impressive sheep image using MidJourney. Inspired by her creativity, I decided to develop a custom NFT smart contract that allows anyone, even with a minimal wallet balance, to mint this unique artwork. The widespread appreciation for my girlfriend's work propelled it to the top of trending charts. This project aims to democratize access to high-quality NFT art, making it accessible to a broader audience and showcasing the potential of AI-generated creativity in the NFT space.

name: Whirl
description:
WHIRL is a novel defi protocol that creates an algorithmically-backed stablecoin which has an increasing floor value over time.

All WHIRL in the wild at any point in time is backed with enough ETH to protect it from selling.

The current tunnel cost is the price which is protected by the treasury.

All WHIRL ever produced is mined on Whirl. Anyone can mine WHIRL, it is permissionless.

Whirl is an experiment. Have fun experimenting with Whirl.

name: Whirl
description:
WHIRL is an ETH-backed onchain mining protocol built on Base.
It distributes ETH to participants through a floor-based mechanism where the cost to mine (Tunnel Cost) only rises over time. Users contribute ETH to create ‚Äúmines,‚Äù and periodically, one is randomly selected to receive ETH rewards - secured by Chainlink VRF. All mined tokens are backed by a growing treasury, and any participant can trigger a price realignment when market price falls below production cost.
WHIRL offers sustainable, non-inflationary yield through timing and participation, without emissions, without staking, and without dilution.

name: Whirl Privacy
description:
Whirl Protocol brings you the first frictionless multichain privacy solution. Our tech is built on top of a ZK-proof system which ensures that the funds transiting through Whirl are secure and benefit from the utmost privacy.

We are leveraging existing technology and liquidity pools to allow our users to seamlessly, through a single transaction, send funds anonymously across different wallets, chains, and eventually tokens.

name: Whirl Protocol
description:
Whirl Protocol is a novel gamified DeFi system built on Base, designed to deliver deep liquidity, sustainable tokenomics, and onchain resiliency ‚Äî all without relying on traditional market makers or centralized infrastructure.

At its core, Whirl uses an innovative mining mechanism that automatically deepens WHIRL/WETH liquidity with every mined token, aligning token emissions with real liquidity growth. This system includes auto-liquidification, treasury-backed price stabilization, and unique mechanics like tunnel costs and blok mining.

Whirl is censorship-resistant by design: all core actions can be executed directly onchain without reliance on a frontend, aligning fully with the values of trustless and decentralized finance. We‚Äôre building infrastructure that‚Äôs not just robust, but composable ‚Äî from lending and derivatives to integration with other DeFi primitives on the Superchain.

Our vision is to establish WHIRL as a foundational DeFi asset on Base and beyond, offering predictable value mechanics, powerful integrations, and a path toward scalable, community-owned liquidity systems.

name: XChain SDK - Multi-Chain Blockchain SDK
description:
XChain SDK is a multi-chain SDK supporting Ethereum, 13 L2 networks, and Solana. It provides a unified API for frontend and backend developers, enabling seamless cross-chain application development. Features include token transfers, NFT management, smart contract read/write, event listening, multicall, and advanced fee and gas management.

## üåü Features

### üõ† **Comprehensive Multi-Chain Support**
- **Ethereum** and **Leading L2 Networks**: Optimism, Arbitrum, Base, Polygon, zkSync, Linea, Scroll, and more.
- **Solana** with full SPL Token, NFT, and native SOL support.
- **Unified API** for seamless interactions across all supported chains.

### üí∞ **Native & Token Operations**
- Get native coin (ETH, MATIC, SOL, etc.) balances.
- Get ERC20/SPL token balances.
- Transfer native coins.
- Transfer ERC20/SPL tokens.
- Fetch token information (name, symbol, decimals, total supply).

### üñº **NFT Management**
- Get ERC721/SPL NFT balances.
- Get owner of a specific NFT.
- Mint new ERC721/SPL NFTs (requires specific contract logic or metaplex setup).
- View NFTs owned by an address.

### üìù **Smart Contract Interaction**
- Read data from any EVM smart contract (e.g., `balanceOf`, `symbol`).
- Write transactions to any EVM smart contract (e.g., `transfer`, `approve`).
- Multicall functionality for efficient batching of read operations on EVM chains.

### üì° **Network Utilities**
- Get current block number/slot.
- Get current gas prices/fee data.
- Estimate gas for EVM transactions.
- Get transaction history for Solana.
- Comprehensive health checks for RPC endpoints (latency, block sync).
- Event listening for real-time updates on EVM chains.

### üîë **Wallet Management**
- Generate new random EVM and Solana wallets.
- Securely manage private keys for backend operations.
- Integrate with frontend wallet extensions (MetaMask, Phantom, etc.).

name: XO - AI-powered Matchmaking Protocol
description:
In 2022, nearly 70,000 people reported a romance scam, and reported losses hit a staggering $1.3 billion. Despite the prevalence of SNS, 79% GenZ feel lonely. Current apps fail to help them connect deeply.

XO is the game changer of next generation social discovery platform. We help GenZ initiate intimate conversations with blockchain-verified identity and AI assistance.

name: Xottle : Tokenized Bottle Waste
description:
Xottle: Tokenized Bottle Waste Platform addresses the pressing issue of plastic waste by creating a system that encourages and rewards recycling.
Here's how Xottle makes a difference:

1. Incentivizing Recycling
People often lack motivation to recycle due to the absence of immediate rewards. Xottle solves this by rewarding users with $XOTL tokens for every bottle they recycle. These tokens can be used to purchase merchandise or access exclusive benefits, turning recycling into a rewarding activity.

2. Transparency and Trust
Traditional recycling programs can be opaque, leading to mistrust. Xottle leverages blockchain technology to ensure transparency, recording every recycled bottle and transaction on the blockchain. This provides users with verifiable proof that their recycling efforts are contributing positively to the environment.

3. Gamifying the Experience
Recycling is often seen as mundane, which can lead to disengagement. Xottle makes recycling engaging through challenges and leaderboards, where users can earn badges and compete to see who can recycle the most. This gamification keeps users motivated and involved.

4. Simplifying the Process
The complexity of recycling can deter participation. Xottle simplifies this by allowing users to scan a QR code on each bottle, instantly registering their recycling and earning rewards. This makes recycling as easy as scanning a code, lowering the barrier to participation.

Summary
Xottle is a platform that combines financial incentives, gamification, and blockchain transparency to make recycling easier, more engaging, and rewarding. By transforming the way people perceive and participate in recycling, Xottle contributes to reducing plastic waste and promoting a more sustainable future. This solution is not just for individuals, but also for companies and organizations looking to enhance their sustainability initiatives.

name: YAMI
description:
2023 was a challenging year for everyone in the crypto space, from developers and artists to investors and airdrop hunters.

In response, I created a new collection called "YAMI," meaning "darkness" in Japanese. It reflected my mood at the time: not entirely bright, with parts of my mind dark enough to cause pain. However, we had to endure the winter to reach the delightful summer. This collection symbolizes our collective struggle and hope to overcome adversity and emerge stronger and brighter.

The collection comprises 2023 pieces of generative art, mirroring the year of its creation. While it wasn't a free-mint collection, many generous art lovers minted the pieces. It wasn't just about the art; it was about communication, community, and the broader economy within the network.

I collaborated with the LEX Labs team for this collection, so I didn't deploy the contract myself. LEX Labs, a skilled team of developers managing an NFT community, assisted with image generation, contract deployment, and more.
https://opensea.io/collection/yamiofficial/

I've been an NFT artist since 2022, primarily focusing on Layer 2 solutions. My second collection, "TOMO," consisting of 10k pieces, was on the Optimism network and minted out quickly within 24 hours.
https://opensea.io/collection/tomonft

Following TOMO, I achieved great success with an open-edition art piece in collaboration with Coinbase and Manifold. Titled "Optimistic Handstand," this open-edition piece on the Optimism network saw over 20k pieces minted.

name: Yecho
description:
Yecho is a multi-chain DeFi yield analytics platform designed to help users monitor, analyze, and optimize their on-chain earnings across protocols and blockchains. It runs daily balance snapshots, aggregates yield data at both token and protocol level, and presents it through an intuitive and interactive dashboard. Yecho currently supports leading protocols such as Aave, Compound, Spark, Venus, Fluid, YieldFi, Hyperlend, and Felix, with new integrations added regularly across EVM-compatible chains.

How it works
Getting started with Yecho is straightforward: users connect any EVM-compatible wallet to their dashboard, and Yecho automatically detects active DeFi positions within supported protocols. Each day, the platform takes a complete on-chain snapshot of positions, lending deposits balances. This process is fully automated no manual data entry is required. The snapshot data is stored securely and preserved over time, enabling users to revisit historical performance.

Once collected, the data is processed to calculate daily gains, track cumulative yields, and identify trends. Users can explore this information via interactive charts, compare performance across protocols, and analyze changes over time. By consolidating yield data from multiple chains into a single, user-friendly interface, Yecho makes it easier to understand portfolio performance and refine investment strategies.

Behind the scenes, a dedicated snapshot script runs on a secure server, using ethers.js to query smart contracts directly via RPC calls. To improve efficiency and minimize network load, Yecho leverages Multicall requests, allowing multiple balance queries to be bundled into a single RPC call. This architecture ensures accurate, up-to-date analytics while remaining scalable for a growing user base.

By combining blockchain integrations, automated yield tracking, and in-depth analytics, Yecho offers DeFi participants a powerful tool to monitor and optimize their earnings across multiple ecosystems in one place.

In April 2024, I faced a devastating hack, putting everything down and at risk. I decided to rebuild from scratch, with a self-funded approach. That‚Äôs how Reflect was born, a protocol dedicated to developing AI-powered execution layers for DeFi.

I'm building specialized agents, starting with the Dromes (Aero and Velo). Flight Fren, is an agent that allows users to swap, add liquidity, vote, lock tokens, and track onchain data effortlessly all through natural language commands.

Flight Fren is here to transform how users interact with DeFi:

name: zkBob smart contract privacy wallet
description:
zkBob is a stablecoin-based privacy wallet built for everyday users on Optimism. zkBob is optimized for common financial activities that benefit from privacy, including salary distributions, donations, and DAO disbursements. 

zkBob uses zkSNARKS to anonymize senders, receivers, and amounts when transferring stable funds (USDC on Optimism). When a transfer is initiated, the amount and recipient is never disclosed or published. Transactions are routed through a relayer, abstracting gas fees while providing an efficient transfer environment.  

zkBob integrates compliance features such as deposit limits and optional KYC to offer secure and private transactions while preventing illicit activities. 

Development is underway to support a decentralized relayer infrastructure including upgrading scripts for contracts (currently in progress), deploying a release with new accounting features to the Op USDC Pool, deploying a release with a decentralized relayer to the Op USDC Pool and deployment of additional provers/relayers.

- For more information on compliance and zkBob, please see https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=4787693.

- For additional info on mechanics and usage, please see https://docs.zkbob.com/

- Usage on Optimism can be seen here: https://dune.com/zkbob/zkbob-on-optimism

name: zkCross Network
description:
Introducing zkCross Network

We are zkCross Network, a team dedicated to revolutionizing decentralized finance (DeFi) by making it accessible and seamless across multiple blockchains. Our mission is to simplify complex DeFi transactions like swapping and bridging with just one click.

Who We Are

Our team comprises blockchain enthusiasts and experts focused on creating innovative solutions to enhance the DeFi ecosystem. We specialize in smart contracts, blockchain architecture, and decentralized applications (DApps).

What We Do

zkCross Network offers a DeFi Infrastructure-as-a-Service platform, automating complex DeFi interactions. Our key features include:

One-click Cross-Chain Interoperability: Supporting both EVM and non-EVM blockchains.
User-friendly Onboarding: Direct fiat on-ramp for easy user access.
Liquidity Solutions: Creating liquidity pools to boost Total Value Locked (TVL).
Advanced Security: Using multi-party computation and decentralized validation.
Impact and Achievements

Our integrations have significantly boosted transaction volumes and user engagement. For example, our work with Partisia increased transaction volumes by 35% and daily active users by 25% within three months. We have processed over $59 million in transactions and activated 18,000+ unique wallets.

Where are we active
Our contract has been deployed over BSC, ETH and Poygon with Contract address 0xa186724da1708e1580be5da52b0f0a5366a5a6fec45604fc6f0d9f933d1d1627 and recently deployed on Base with expected volume to come soon.

Vision for Optimism

We aim to leverage Optimism's Layer 2 scaling solutions to enhance our platform further, increasing user engagement and transaction efficiency. This integration will contribute to the growth of the Optimism ecosystem.

name: zkFetch
description:
I'm Rohit, working as a DevRel and Strategy Manager at Reclaim Protocol, where I lead all on-chain initiatives and integrations across various blockchain ecosystems.

Excited to introduce zkFetch‚Äîa powerful, verifiable, and cost-efficient oracle service powered by zkTLS.

What is zkFetch?
zkFetch extends standard HTTP fetch operations with zero-knowledge proofs (ZKPs). Built on top of the Reclaim Protocol (fully open-source), it enables secure data retrieval from any remote source while proving the integrity of the fetch operation‚Äîwithout exposing sensitive details like API keys or private headers.

name: ZKP2P
description:
ZKP2P is a decentralized on/off-ramp built using zero-knowledge proofs that allow users to on-ramp to crypto using every day payment apps (i.e. Venmo, Revolut). Our goal is two-fold, 1) make crypto accessible to non-crypto natives by making it easy to get money on-chain and 2) push the boundaries of how advanced crypto techniques can be used for consumer applications. We believe that we can grow crypto adoption by tying usage closer to the apps people use every day already.

At the core of our mission is continuing to push new user adoption. We believe that these new cryptographic primitives open up novel ways for Web2 data to be used on-chain. However, these new primitives need to be built in such a way that they are viable for broader usage. Our major ongoing contributions to the space will be adapting / building the core infrastructure to be viable for broader consumption. The true magic of these cryptographic primitives can truly only be felt by enabling novel and worthwhile experiences that attract old and new users alike.

We are hoping to achieve this by experimenting with and advancing various other Ethereum Foundation initiatives for enabling development on top of ZK (ZKEmail) and MPC (TLSNotary). Such initiatives benefit the ecosystem by enabling next generation systems that are:
 - Sybil resistant: users prove information about themselves
 - Meaningful: users are transacting with real world assets they can prove ownership of
 - Trustless: users prove interactions they‚Äôve made instead of relying on intermediaries / oracles to resolve transactions

Our first alpha product, the ZKP2P on-ramp, fills a gap in the on-ramping space where users are able to get money directly on-chain fast (no waiting for wires to clear or new accounts to be created with a third-party) while also being cheaper than other direct on-ramps on the market (ie Moonpay). We are able to achieve this by making our on-ramp a completely non-custodial, P2P marketplace. Since our marketplace is P2P, off-rampers compete to get off-chain by setting lower USDC <> fiat swap rates to entice on-rampers to take their liquidity. In many ways you can view our on-ramp as a Web2 <> Web3 version of UniswapV3. The high-level flow is as such:

1. Liquidity providers on-chain (off-rampers) deposit funds into a Ramp contract 
2. On-rampers can then submit a transaction to place funds into escrow
3. Once the funds are put into escrow the on-ramper can only unlock the on-chain funds for themselves if they are able to submit a valid proof of payment on a Web2 payment network.

Currently, we support Venmo, Revolut, HDFC (UPI), and BBVA Garanti which gives us coverage for USD, EUR, GBP, SGD, INR, and TRY with more to come. Proofs of transactions on these networks are generated by on-rampers providing data related to their off-chain payment to our zero-knowledge circuits. Using zero-knowledge circuits allows us to verify transaction data without the user needing to leak sensitive data to the public.

We strongly believe that as we continue to improve the tech, on-ramps like these not only provide a stronger and more resilient alternative for on-ramping, they also are better able to meet users where they are at, the payment platforms they use everyday. Furthermore, our P2P Marketplace can be extended to far more than just fiat <> crypto swaps. We can extend this framework to other items like tickets and gaming items, reducing fees on secondary marketplaces and providing stronger protection against scams. Consequently we can unlock value for non-speculators and give more people a reason to transact on-chain!

name: ZNS Connect
description:
ZNS Connect is a decentralized naming system designed to simplify Web3 by offering user-friendly and memorable domain names. Our platform enhances digital identities and smooth transactions across multiple blockchains.

ZNS Connect is a decentralized naming system designed to revolutionize the Web3 experience by replacing complex addresses with user-friendly and memorable domain names. ZNS Connect aims to streamline interactions within the blockchain ecosystem, providing a seamless experience for users.

Our mission is to simplify Web3 for users, offering easy-to-remember digital identities that enhance their online presence and facilitate smooth transactions across various blockchains. The ZNS Connect app provides a cohesive platform where users can manage their digital identities, ensuring efficient Web3 interactions.

Enjoy personalized Web3 pages, enhanced security with alphanumeric wallet addresses, and seamless access to DEXs, wallets, and apps using ZNS domain names. By leveraging the power of decentralized technologies, ZNS Connect empowers users to engage with the Web3 world confidently and conveniently, making blockchain technology more accessible and user-friendly. Join us in transforming the digital landscape with ZNS Connect, your gateway to a simplified and integrated Web3 experience.

name: ZoopX Protocol
description:
ZoopX is developing a next-generation bridging and liquidity protocol designed to make cross-chain stablecoin movement seamless, transparent, and yield-generating.

We combine Circle‚Äôs CCTP with LP-backed vaults, enabling users to bridge native stablecoins while liquidity providers earn sustainable yield through our tokenized vault share, USDzy (LST). A smart rebalancing engine manages liquidity daily, while DIA oracles provide real-time vault health and transparency to users.

Our ZPX Router dynamically selects the most efficient bridging path today (CCTP or LP route) and is designed to expand into Any-to-Any token bridging via future DEX/AMM adapters.

ZoopX is being built natively on Base, with the goal of becoming the liquidity backbone of the Superchain, supporting seamless capital flows across ecosystems while keeping security, transparency, and user experience at the core.

name: ztile
description:
Hello Optimism Collective,

I am rembase, an enthusiast of digital art and blockchain technology. Recently, I have harnessed the power of artificial intelligence to create ceramic visuals and transformed these unique pieces into an NFT collection. My project aims to merge the aesthetics and texture of traditional ceramic art with the creative potential of AI, exploring the new boundaries of art in the digital age.

About My Project
The main goal of my project is to combine the creative power of AI with ceramic art, offering art lovers and collectors innovative and original digital artworks. Each NFT in my collection features high-resolution digital representations of AI-generated ceramic visuals. These pieces represent a fusion of modern technology with traditional craftsmanship, creating unique art forms that celebrate the best of both worlds.

Why AI and Ceramics?
Ceramic art has a rich history spanning thousands of years, with each piece reflecting the artist's labor and creativity. In this project, I aimed to add a new dimension to ceramic art by utilizing AI's creative capabilities. The AI algorithms analyze traditional ceramic designs and generate unique and creative visuals. As a result, each NFT becomes an art piece that blends traditional art forms with cutting-edge technology.

Why It Matters to Optimism Collective
Optimism Collective, as an ecosystem supporting decentralized and community-focused projects, offers great opportunities for artists like me. Developing this project on Optimism allows me to bring AI-based art and NFTs to a wider audience. Additionally, Optimism's fast and low-cost transactions enable more efficient interactions between collectors and artists.

Future Plans
I plan to expand this collection further, enriching it with different ceramic techniques and styles. Moreover, I aim to collaborate with other innovative projects in the fields of AI and art to create a broader and more diverse digital art collection. By working within the Optimism ecosystem, I look forward to developing community-driven projects and bringing together artists and collectors.

Thank you for the opportunity to introduce my project. I am excited to be on this journey of bringing AI and ceramic art into the digital world with you.

Best regards,
Rembase
